product_name: Maui Jim Stone Crushers Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Slip on the durable, tough and light Maui Jim Stone Crushers polarized sunglasses for all day wear, sports, and any time other shades are too heavy to wear through the day. Tough grilamid frame, lightweight polycarbonate lenses and adjustable nosepads make these high-performance shades perfect for all your active adventures in the sun. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Maui Jim PolarizedPlus(R)2 technology blocks glare and UV rays from all angles; manages harmful blue light and boosts colors for clarity and contrast. Matte Black frames feature neutral grey tinted lenses, perfect for bright, direct sunlight; they offer rich color and contrast. Matte Rootbeer frames feature HCL(R) Bronze lenses, ideal for everyday, variable conditions from full sun to overcast; they provide excellent contrast and a warm tint. Grilamid nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely light and impact resistant. Grippy, comfortable rubber nose pads prevent slippage. The Maui Jim Stone Crushers polarized sunglasses come with a protective case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: Slip on the durable, tough and light Maui Jim Stone Crushers polarized sunglasses for all day wear, sports, and any time other shades are too heavy to wear through the day.
